text: baaz ahamaq log ye kah baithegen ki musalamaan jis qibale baitul muqaddas kee taraph pahale se sajada karate the us se doosare qibale kee taraph mud jaane ka bais hua. ai rasool tum unake javaab mein kaho ki poorab pashchim sab khuda ka hai jise chaahata hai seedhe raaste kee taraph hidaayat karata hai
